(423x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 423. (423x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 123. (423x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 185. (423x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 22. (423x27+19)/16 mod 64 = 11. (423x81+73)/32 mod 32 = 17. (423x243+251)/64 mod 16 = 10. (423x243+251)/128 mod 8 = 5. (423x729+881)/256 mod 4 = 0. (423x729+881)/512 mod 2 = 0. (423x729+881)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
